overview:
Mark joined the PAC Labs in 2009 as Vice President of Engineering. During his time with PAC Labs he has overseen the launch of the Gild product.

From 2001-2006 as Senior Software Manager at ETRADE mark led a number of initiatives; implementing agile tools and methodologies across the software development organization, managing revenue-critical migration and conversion of customer balances and records to a new trading platform, development of high-availability price charting systems.

Mark was Director of Engineering at ClearStation, Inc prior to its acquisition by ETRADE.
